snippet: If Congress abdicates its responsibility in this military campaign, it will allow President Obama free rein to set a dangerous precedent.
abstract: Editorial criticizes Congress for appearing perfectly willing to abdicate its authority to declare war as Pentagon gears up to expand its fight against Islamic State in Iraq and Syria; contends Congress is allowing Pres Obama free rein to set dangerous precedent that will last well past this particular military campaign; urges Congress to weigh in soon.
lead_paragraph: If Congress abdicates its responsibility in this military campaign, it will allow President Obama free rein to set a dangerous precedent.
